title: 132. It’s Not That There Are No Good Men, It Might Be That You Don’t Believe You Can Have One
itunes:title: It’s Not That There Are No Good Men, It Might Be That You Don’t Believe You Can Have One
description:
In this episode of the Self Love Fix podcast, we’re talking about magnetism and how you can use it to stop chasing love and find a relationship that works for you.

We all have different tendencies in what we tell ourselves about the people we seek romantic relationships with. But it’s time to examine if those ideas are helping or hindering our ability to find the love we’re after. 

In this episode we cover:

  • Our Dating Values
  • The Power of Our Subconscious
  • Honesty as Our Liberation

Once you shift your energy around how you speak to yourself regarding relationships and love, you’ll find that it’s much easier to find what you’re looking for romantically.

If you liked this episode of the podcast, take a screenshot, head on over to my Instagram and share it on your IG stories and tag me, @theselflovefix

If you love what you learned, be sure to hit that follow button so you never miss a future episode, and make sure to leave a review to help me reach more listeners just like you looking to follow their inner truth and live a life of abundance & authentic self-love.

 

CONNECT WITH BEATRICE:

Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/theselflovefix 

Website: http://www.beatricekamau.com 

 

EPISODE RESOURCES:

Join the waitlist for my LIVE dating program coming in January 2022. Save your early access spot today before it closes: https://beatricekamau.com/datingsos
